item.description:
Let's blow away the cobwebs of Saturday's Halloween Parties with a brisk pedal through the countryside. We'll be back before the trick-or-treaters come out.
We'll meet at my place in Chaplin Center and head out for an hour to an hour-and-a-half of biking on small roads and forest roads, with bright leaves and autumn air. We'll be going via pretty backroads down to the Mansfield Hollow recreation area, explore their a bit on dirt trails, then head home. There's only one steep hill going the uphill way. We are not serious bikers so there's no pressure to be ultra-fast or fit (people have been known to push their bikes up longer hills) and simply enjoy the scenery and the whoosh :)

..
item.how_to_find_us: White colonial house in the historic district.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Halloweeny Casual Bike Ride (rescheduled from Oct 16th)
